Class CSVProjectRepository

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.repository.csv.CSVProjectRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProjectRepository, IRepository<Project,Integer>
public class CSVProjectRepository extends Object implements IProjectRepository
CSV-based implementation of the project repository. Follows the Single Responsibility Principle by focusing only on project data access.
